snippet: Employees who were previously laid off and had to train their foreign replacements have had their jobs restored with no explanation.
abstract: Around 35 technology employees at Disney/ABC Television in New York and Burbank, Calif, who were told previously that they were to be replaced by immigrants have been told they will keep their jobs; reversal comes in wake of controversy over firing of 250 tech employees at Walt Disney World in Orlando, Fla, who were replaced by immigrants; it is unclear who made decision about workers in New York and Burbank.
lead_paragraph: Employees who were previously laid off and had to train their foreign replacements have had their jobs restored with no explanation.

headline.main: In Turnabout, Disney Cancels Tech Worker Layoffs
headline.print_headline: In Turnabout, Disney Cancels Tech Worker Layoffs
